member.name: T:Net.Asn1.Reader.Asn1Class
member.summary: Enumeration of possible classes in Identifier octet of the ASN.1 node.

member.name: F:Net.Asn1.Reader.Asn1Class.Universal
member.summary: The type is native to ASN.1.

member.name: F:Net.Asn1.Reader.Asn1Class.Application
member.summary: The type is only valid for one specific application

member.name: F:Net.Asn1.Reader.Asn1Class.ContextSpecific
member.summary: Meaning of this type depends on the context (such as within a sequence, set or choice)

member.name: F:Net.Asn1.Reader.Asn1Class.Private
member.summary: Defined in private specifications

member.name: T:Net.Asn1.Reader.Asn1NodeType
member.summary: Internal enumeration of possible nodes when parsing ASN.1 structure.

member.name: F:Net.Asn1.Reader.Asn1NodeType.Primitive
member.summary: ASN.1 type contains primitive value such as Utf8String, Integer etc.

member.name: F:Net.Asn1.Reader.Asn1NodeType.ConstructedStart
member.summary: ASN.1 type contains another ASN.1 type. This could be Sequence, Set etc.

member.name: F:Net.Asn1.Reader.Asn1NodeType.ConstructedEnd
member.summary: Virtual type of node indicating that ASN.1 constructed node has been parsed completely.

member.name: F:Net.Asn1.Reader.Asn1NodeType.DocumentStart
member.summary: Virtual type of node indicating that parser is at the beginning of ASN.1 structure.

member.name: F:Net.Asn1.Reader.Asn1NodeType.DocumentEnd
member.summary: Virtual type of node indicating that parsing of ASN.1 structure has been completed.

member.name: T:Net.Asn1.Reader.Asn1Type
member.summary: Enumeration of possible ASN.1 universal class tags in Identifier octet.

member.name: T:Net.Asn1.Reader.BerReader
member.summary: BER reader. Implementation works on top o a stream. The stream should be seekable.

member.name: F:Net.Asn1.Reader.BerReader._disposed
member.summary: Flag indicating whether instance has been disposed

member.name: F:Net.Asn1.Reader.BerReader._nodeStack
member.summary: Stack to help going through the structure of ASN.1.

member.name: F:Net.Asn1.Reader.BerReader._current
member.summary: Current node that can be read.

member.name: F:Net.Asn1.Reader.BerReader._innerStream
member.summary: Inner stream on top of which this class operates.

member.name: M:Net.Asn1.Reader.BerReader.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: Stream that holds ASN.1 structure that shall be parsed.
True to leave the stream open after the BerReader object is disposed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Net.Asn1.Reader.BerReader.Read(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Parse next node in ASN.1 structure.
member.param: Flag indicating that value of each node should be read as well.

member.name: M:Net.Asn1.Reader.BerReader.InternalReadElement(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Parse ASN.1 node and sets the result to class. Flag indicating that value of each node should be read as well.

member.name: M:Net.Asn1.Reader.BerReader.ReadLength
member.summary: Reads length of given ASN.1 object.

member.name: M:Net.Asn1.Reader.BerReader.ReadIdentifierOctet
member.summary: Reads identifier octet from ASN.1 object.

member.name: M:Net.Asn1.Reader.BerReader.ReadByteOrThrow(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Reads one byte from given stream.

member.name: M:Net.Asn1.Reader.BerReader.ReadToEnd(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Parse whole ASN.1 structure. class holds all the mappings. Values of the tags are not read.
member.param: Flag indicating that value of each node should be read as well.
member.returns: Internal node with map of parsed ASN.1 structure.

member.name: M:Net.Asn1.Reader.BerReader.ReadContentAsBuffer
member.summary: Read value of current node.

member.name: M:Net.Asn1.Reader.BerReader.ReadContentAsBuffer(Net.Asn1.Reader.InternalNode)
member.summary: Read value of given node. Underlying stream in BER reader has to be seekable to do that.
member.param: Node whose value shall be read.

member.name: M:Net.Asn1.Reader.BerReader.ReadContentAsBuffer(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Read value of current node.
member.param: Reader will read content to this parameter. The parameter need to be initialized beforehand with length of actual read node.

member.name: M:Net.Asn1.Reader.BerReader.ReadContentAsBuffer(Net.Asn1.Reader.InternalNode,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Read value of given node. Underlying stream in BER reader has to be seekable to do that.
member.param: Node whose value shall be read.
Reader will read content to this parameter. The parameter need to be initialized beforehand with length of actual read node.

member.name: M:Net.Asn1.Reader.BerReader.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes object.

member.name: M:Net.Asn1.Reader.BerReader.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Disposes object.
member.param: Flag indicating if it is safe to dispose managed resources.

member.name: M:Net.Asn1.Reader.BerReader.Finalize
member.summary: Class destructor that disposes object if caller forgot to do so

member.name: P:Net.Asn1.Reader.BerReader.CurrentNode
member.summary: Gets current node. Usable when reading of content of a ASN.1 tag is not so important at the moment.

member.name: P:Net.Asn1.Reader.BerReader.Depth
member.summary: Value indicating the actual depth of parser in ASN.1 structure.

member.name: T:Net.Asn1.Reader.Helpers
member.summary: Helper methods, mostly converters.

member.name: F:Net.Asn1.Reader.Helpers.utcTimeRegex
member.summary: Regular expression for parsing UTCTime according to ITU-T X.690 recommendation

member.name: F:Net.Asn1.Reader.Helpers.generalizedTimeRegex
member.summary: Regular expression for parsing GeenralizedTime according to ITU-T X.690 recommendation

member.name: M:Net.Asn1.Reader.Helpers.ConvertFromUniversalTime(System.String)
member.summary: Converts string value to DateTimeOffset. String value is representing UTCTime according to ITU-T X.680 recommendation

member.name: M:Net.Asn1.Reader.Helpers.ConvertFromGeneralizedTime(System.String)
member.summary: Converts string value to DateTimeOffset. String value is representing GeneralizedTime according to ITU-T X.680 recommendation

member.summary: Identifier Octet in ASN.1 object

member.name: P:Net.Asn1.Reader.InternalNode.Identifier
member.summary: Identifier of ASN.1 object

member.name: P:Net.Asn1.Reader.InternalNode.Length
member.summary: Length of ASN.1 node data. Identifier and Length octets of TLV are excluded. It is length of the Value octets.

member.name: P:Net.Asn1.Reader.InternalNode.RawValue
member.summary: Value of ASN.1 node in bytes. This property is not set automatically by Reader. User should set it by calling specific method on Reader to read the value.

member.name: P:Net.Asn1.Reader.InternalNode.StartPosition
member.summary: Start position of ASN.1 node in the inner stream.

member.name: P:Net.Asn1.Reader.InternalNode.EndPosition
member.summary: End position of ASN.1 node in the inner stream.

member.summary: Flag indicating indefinite length of ASN.1 node.

member.name: P:Net.Asn1.Reader.InternalNode.DataOffsetToStream
member.summary: Position to the inner stream where Value octets begin.

member.summary: Flag indicating that this node is not

member.summary: Type of the ASN.1 node
